hero.title: KSA Flag Football
hero.subtitle: Flag football is more than just a sport—it's a fast-growing, inclusive game that connects communities. As an official Olympic sport debuting at LA 2028, flag football is taking the world by storm. KSA Flag Football is dedicated to growing the game across the Kingdom, giving everyone the opportunity to play, compete, and be part of something extraordinary.
hero.modalDescription: KSA Flag Football is growing the sport across Saudi Arabia. Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced player, everyone is welcome.
hero.modalPractice: We hold weekly practices in Jeddah — come try it out!

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Join KSA Flag Football (KSAFF) and connect with a dynamic community dedicated to flag football excellence in Saudi Arabia. Whether you're a player, team manager, coach, referee, or fan, KSAFF provides a comprehensive platform for growth, competition, and active participation in the fastest-growing sport heading to the Olympics.

teamsPage.title: Our Teams
teamsPage.description: Meet the clubs competing across the Kingdom and beyond. KSAFF is building a thriving flag football community.
teamsPage.clubDescription: Our club teams form the backbone of the KSAFF community, competing in local leagues and international tournaments across the region.

alBahara.name: Al Bahara
alBahara.description: Based in Jeddah, Al Bahara is one of the most active teams in the KSAFF community. They have competed in tournaments across the region, representing Saudi flag football in Abu Dhabi, Dubai, and Jeddah — building experience and bringing home invaluable international exposure.

cheetahs.name: Cheetahs
cheetahs.description: The Cheetahs made history by winning the tournament in Barcelona, proving that Saudi flag football talent can compete and triumph on the international stage. Their championship run was a defining moment for the KSAFF community.

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.description: KSAFF hosts tournaments for men and women, showcasing flag football talent across the Kingdom. These competitions build skills at every level and prepare athletes for regional and international events, including the road to the 2028 Olympics.
tournaments.season2025Description: Our 2025 season saw KSAFF expand across the region with tournaments in Abu Dhabi, Barcelona, and Dubai, plus a summer league in Saudi Arabia in partnership with Bridgeway Sports.

abuDhabi.title: Abu Dhabi Tournament
abuDhabi.description: Kicking off the 2025 season with a competitive tournament in Abu Dhabi.

barcelona.title: Barcelona Tournament
barcelona.description: KSAFF took the game international with a tournament in Barcelona.

summerLeague.title: Summer League — Riyadh & Jeddah
summerLeague.description: A summer league across Riyadh and Jeddah in partnership with Bridgeway Sports.

kaust.title: KAUST Summer Tournament
kaust.description: The summer league culminated with a tournament at KAUST to close out the season.

dubai.title: Dubai Tournament
dubai.description: Wrapping up 2025 with a year-end tournament in Dubai.

everyBody.title: Every Body Counts
everyBody.description: Be part of Saudi Arabia's flag football journey! We are building a vibrant community that nurtures the sport from grassroots to elite levels, embracing inclusivity, fostering competitiveness, and developing world-class programs. Flag football is for everyone—no matter your age, gender, or experience level. Join us in growing the game across the Kingdom.

media.title: Media
media.description: Highlights from our tournaments, practices, and community events across Saudi Arabia and beyond.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Want to play flag football, join a team, or learn more about KSAFF? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.practice: Every week in Jeddah — all levels welcome

calendar.title: 2026 Season Calendar
calendar.description: A year at a glance — tournaments, leagues, and events planned for the 2026 season across Saudi Arabia and the region.
calendar.note: Dates and events are subject to change. Follow us on Instagram @flagfootballksa for updates.

events.maySummerLeague: Summer League kicks off — Riyadh & Jeddah

blog.title: Latest News & Articles
blog.post1Title: KSA Flag Football Stars Shine at IFAF Asia Championship
blog.post1Excerpt: The Saudi flag football team delivered a stunning performance at the IFAF Asia Continental Championship, advancing to the semi-finals in a historic achievement.
blog.post2Title: Fanatics Flag Football Classic Coming to Riyadh
blog.post2Excerpt: Tom Brady headlines an all-star flag football tournament at Kingdom Arena in Riyadh on March 21, 2026, featuring NFL legends in a round-robin format.
blog.post3Excerpt: KSAFF has released the official 2026 competition calendar, featuring expanded leagues and Olympic qualification events.

footer.tagline: Follow us on our social platforms to stay updated with KSA Flag Football!
